channel.title: DRAgon Hai robes help!
channel.description: can u please help me!!! on how to adding dragon hai robes to my 317 server please!!!!

item.title: DRAgon Hai robes help!
item.dc:creator: @I_need_a_username I need a username
item.description:
@I_need_a_username wrote:

First of all…Its “dagon hai” 2nd…You need a client, 3rd you need the Models, and ints…
OK
1.) open client folder
2.) Find folder named “models”
3.) Copy & past dagon hai models in that folder
4.) Go back, and open “class 8.java”
5.) Add ints (lOOK IT UP)
6.) compile & open client, Run game, Login
7.) type add model your dagon hai model ID here
8.) open client.java (i think…) and look for a bunch of numbers
that says “amulets” “tops” “bottoms”, ETC and add Top model ID to tops
, Add bottom model ID to bottoms

Read full topic
